officialTitle: Neuropathic Pain Treatment Using F0434 vs. Gabapentin in Patients With Chronic Distal Diabetic Polyneuropathy: A Randomized, Controlled, Double-blind Study
summary: This is a prospective, randomized, double blind, comparative, experimental controlled Phase 3 clinical trial to assess the efficacy, safety and superiority of F0343 (gabapentin combined with B vitamins) compared to gabapentin alone for treating neuropathic pain in subjects with chronic distal diabetic polyneuropathy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Neuropathic Pain Score at Visit 3 (Week 1)
